column3: “Some of the best stuff I've had. thisbis a perfect sativa if you don't wanna come down any time soon. I'm going to be making brownies soon so I'll post another review of those as well, but I love this dank,  strong smelling medicine. very good. not displeased one bit”
“Beautiful high, long lasting and creative. Great hybrid to keep an eye out for this one in 2014”

“Picked up an oz of this peppery wonder today. I unfortunately got the outdoor version so it's left a lot on the table. This medication is a real head high and definately sativa. I will buy again once i find it in a nice indoor version.”
“one of my new favorites. great long lasting high. awesome smell. dense buds. slow to hit but when it does, get ready for a nice trip.”

“Absolute fav! Great high, long lasting effects. 
Great for any pain relief(:”
“definitely best flavor, my favorite of any strain. very good high and no fuzzyness or gaps.”

“I got this from a local grower an brought it into a friend's house an there cousin screams from the other room that it stinks like weed , the
 baggie was still shut.. possibly now in my top 5 tastes amazing an is covered in trichomes”
“THE TASTE ON THIS IS SOOOO GOOOF”
